fulltext:
STAN BIRYUKOV
83 Phan Ke Binh
|
Saigon, Vietnam
|
+840702003731 |
stan.biryukov88@gmail.com
OBJECTIVE
Be a valued team member for a company that provides an environment
for growth, to develop my skills and contribute to the success and
increase client base.
TECH SKILLS
–
Agile/Scrum methodology;
–
Fluent with JavaScript, Java, C#;
–
Framework and Libraries: ASP.NET MVC5, ASP.Net Core, Entity,
Spring, Node.js, SASS (LESS), jQuery, Java Collections,
CodeIgniter, Zend, CakePHP, TBB, Boost, STL, ReactJS, Angular
(2,4,6,7), Nativescript;
–
Databases: Microsoft SQL Server (2014, 2017), MySQL, Postgree,
MongoDB, Couchbase, ElasticSearch;
–
IDE or software: VS 2015-2017 IDE, VS Code IDE, Eclipse IDE,
Android Studio IDE, PHP Storm IDE, Unity 3D, Docker;
–
Object-Oriented design: Design Patterns.
SOFT SKILLS
–
Creative problem-solving;
–
Ability to work to others’ design;
–
Focused at working during long working hours;
–
Desire and ability to contribute to the company’s success;
–
Multi-task oriented;
–
Able to convey the message clearly;
–
Respect to confidentiality of data;
–
Flexible at communication.
CERTIFICATES
–
International English Language Testing System (IELTS) General
Training, C1 – 7.0 out of 9.0 ( TOEFL iBT: 94-101 ) overall,
Ref. Number – 18VN003807BIRS028G.
2
EXPERIENCE
Senior Software Engineer,
Hitachi Consulting (former GSC Vietnam)
June 2016 – Present
TP HCM, Vietnam
Handle design, communication and implementation of the projects.
Implementation conducted by PHP5 with CakePHP framework, Java EE
(Spring, Hibernate), ASP.Net MVC5, with support of the jQuery,
Render.js, HTML5 cache, ES6 features; databases MySQL and Postgree,
and Microsoft SQL server 2014-2017. Handle communication and
teaching English classes for Vietnamese colleges.
Successfully accomplished:
–
Front-end and back end for property selling/buying for a
multinational Japanese client;
–
Back-end in project for Japanese client for automatization
daily routine processes as team leader with three programmers
on the team;
–
Front-end, and Back-end for North American project brought
stability and clarity in the functional part by refactoring
and optimizing;
–
Joined and working close with team on ML project for new
customer, personally responsible for Sentiment Analysis
algorithm.
Software Engineer, WebOnyx
October 2015 – March 2016
TP HCM, Vietnam
Managed and improved internal team communication. Established
a more effective way for Tester and Designer work process that
increased the speed and feedback from developers, also contributed
to company documentation and set up the debug feature for IDE,
which dramatically reduced the time and simplified debugging
process. Implemented responsive design and functionality of new
marketing website. Additionally, studied and became familiar with
ReactJS, Relay. GraphQL, SASS and improved knowledge about front-
end development by learning deeper CSS, JQuery and responsive
design.
Software Engineer, Orbitsoft
November 2013 – June 2015
Rostov-on-Don, Russia
Implemented new UI modifications to the project by improving
the usability, increased customer satisfaction by providing
comprehensive solutions per theirs requests, implemented additional
scripts which optimized data storing space, optimized MySQL queries
which resulted in faster feedback and better user experience,
successfully accomplished as front-end migration part on AngularJS
3
as the back-end with accommodation Doctrine ORM. The process of the
development relied on Agile with weekly updates for production and
CRYSTAL methodologies. TDD methodology was used to ensure that all
the functional requirements were understood and delivered on or
before schedule. All of this experience has helped me better
understand the android platform and developed my skills with Couch
Base, MongoDB, ElasticSearch, Zend Framework, CodeIgniter, PHP,
Angular and jQuery.
Software Engineer, Zuzex
April 2012 – March 2013
Rostov-on-Don, Russia
Improved existed file sharing Android application by fixing
the issues, extended functionality by adding notification messages,
versioning, and redesigned existed UI making it user friendlier.
Established a good communication with web developers that helped to
bring new features on server side and make stable previously
implemented ones. I have learned how to work with RESTful and
ClickBank APIs, which were used for client server communication,
and license checking of .Net Forms windows optimizer application.
Successfully accomplished file synchronization part of a cloud
sharing application for PC platform by working closely with my team
where we followed Agile, SCRUM, and XP methodologies. Gained
valuable experience in C++ multithreading with TBB and Boost
libraries, .NET 2.0 and Windows Forms, Android Native and NDK
toolset.
Database Operations Technician, DataIntensityJune 2009 – April 2012
Rostov-on-Don, Russia
During my work there I automatized daily routine tasks,
became familiar with ORACLE DB infrastructure, trained new
employees that made my team most acknowledged and most reliable
among others, by good guidance and wise management improved quality
service which brought many new clients, and greatly improved the
satisfaction of existing clients.
EDUCATION
Don State Technical University – Rostov-on-Don, Russia – Bachelor
of Science in Computer and Information Technology
REFERENCES
Truong Dinh Tu
Senior Front-end Developer, Hyakusenrenma Vietnam Co., Ltd
turtle.fourth@gmail.com

educations.major_categories: Máy tính và công nghệ thông tin

experiences.detail:
TP HCM, Vietnam Managed and improved internal team communication. Established a more effective way for Tester and Designer work process that increased the speed and feedback from developers, also contributed to company documentation and set up the debug feature for IDE, which dramatically reduced the time and simplified debugging process. Implemented responsive design and functionality of new marketing website. Additionally, studied and became familiar with
ReactJS, Relay. GraphQL, SASS and improved knowledge about front- end development by learning deeper CSS, JQuery and responsive design.

Rostov-on-Don, Russia Implemented new UI modifications to the project by improving the usability, increased customer satisfaction by providing comprehensive solutions per theirs requests, implemented additional scripts which optimized data storing space, optimized MySQL queries which resulted in faster feedback and better user experience, successfully accomplished as front-end migration part on AngularJS as the back-end with accommodation Doctrine ORM. The process of the development relied on Agile with weekly updates for production and
CRYSTAL methodologies. TDD methodology was used to ensure that all the functional requirements were understood and delivered on or before schedule. All of this experience has helped me better understand the android platform and developed my skills with Couch Base, MongoDB, ElasticSearch, Zend Framework, CodeIgniter, PHP, Angular and jQuery.

Rostov-on-Don, Russia Improved existed file sharing Android application by fixing the issues, extended functionality by adding notification messages, versioning, and redesigned existed UI making it user friendlier.
Established a good communication with web developers that helped to bring new features on server side and make stable previously implemented ones. I have learned how to work with RESTful and
ClickBank APIs, which were used for client server communication, and license checking of .Net Forms windows optimizer application.
Successfully accomplished file synchronization part of a cloud sharing application for PC platform by working closely with my team where we followed Agile, SCRUM, and XP methodologies. Gained valuable experience in C++ multithreading with TBB and Boost libraries, .NET 2.0 and Windows Forms, Android Native and NDK toolset.

Rostov-on-Don, Russia During my work there I automatized daily routine tasks, became familiar with ORACLE DB infrastructure, trained new employees that made my team most acknowledged and most reliable among others, by good guidance and wise management improved quality service which brought many new clients, and greatly improved the satisfaction of existing clients.
